message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. Let me know if this works for you.
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  I can come down a bit to $10,500. This is a really fair offer, considering the value this product will bring you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I am willing to consider $10,000 as a potential price for the product. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations.
